# images

**Instance Property**

The complete array of image objects that compose the animation of an animated object.

## Declaration

```swift
var images: [UIImage]? { get }
```

## Discussion

For a non-animated image, the value of this property is `nil`.

## Getting the image data

- **cgImage**: The underlying Quartz image data.
- **ciImage**: The underlying Core Image data.
- **imageAsset**: The image asset (if any) for the image.

items.description: The image asset (if any) for the image.
